virtual XFCIMPORT UINT32 XFcAudioStream::stream (  void *    aBuffer,
INT32    aTargetSamples,
INT32    aOffset,
INT32    aSamples
)  [pure virtual]
 

Called when new data is required by the system (callback).

Parameters:
aBuffer Pointer to target sound buffer data.
aTargetSamples Size of target sound buffer data in samples.
aOffset Start offset to target sound buffer data.
aSamples Required number of samples.
Returns:
1 if successful, 0 if unsuccessful (currently ignored).
